net.tmachine.gpg.hue
Class ShapeRenderer

java.lang.Object
  net.tmachine.gpg.hue.BaseHUD
      net.tmachine.gpg.hue.ShapeRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, HUD, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
public class ShapeRenderer
extends BaseHUD
implements HUD

Very simple renderer that simply renders every shape in the base document using a unique colour for each.

Displays some very basic instructions on how to get started iff the document is empty (which is very bad OOP design, but it makes it easier to get started with the demo!)
